title: Bootstrapping Fuzzers for Compilers of Low-Resource Language Dialects Using Language Models
data:
S Vaidya, M Bhme, L D'Antoni- arXiv preprint arXiv:2512.05887, 2025
Modern extensible compiler frameworks-such as MLIR-enable rapid creation of 
domain-specific language dialects. This flexibility, however, makes correctness 
harder to ensure as the same extensibility that accelerates development also
